Control Name: 1.6.2 There is a difference in configuration for production and non-production environments.
Control Statement: Understand the scope of the solution and distinguish between SKUs used in production and non-production environments. To drive down cost it might be possible to consolidate environments for applications that are not as critical to the business and not needing the same testing.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.6 What considerations for DevOps practices are you making in this workload?

To drive down cost it might be possible to consolidate environments for applications that are not as critical to the business and not needing the same testing.
